detectors.description:
hdPoolDAI.withdraw(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#927-966) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-r = (balance().mul(_shares)).div(totalSupply()) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#928)
	-tokenToBuyHDCORE = r.mul(HDCOREMin).div(HDCOREMax) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#946)

[hdPoolDAI.withdraw(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#L927-L966) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:

detectors.description:
hdPoolDAI.deposit(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#900-913) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalSupply() == 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#907)

hdPoolDAI.withdraw(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#927-966) ignores return value by OneSplitAudit(onesplit).swap(address(token),address(HDCORE),tokenToBuyHDCORE,_expectedAfterSlippage,_distribution,0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#958)

ERC20.constructor(string,string).name (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#513) shadows:
	- ERC20.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#522-524) (function)

ERC20.constructor(string,string).symbol (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#513) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#530-532) (function)

Reentrancy in hdPoolDAI.deposit(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#900-913):
	External calls:
	- token.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#903)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#912)
		- _balances[account] = _balances[account].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#691)
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#912)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI.sol#690)
